hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: This is a haiku&Five syllables then seven&Five more to finish

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Fire Medallion#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Arrows (5 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Broken Sword# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Spirit Temple# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Shadow Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found in #the Market#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #the Claim Check#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that you must read the names of "Special Deal" items in shops carefully.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Why are they called Wallmasters if they come from the ceiling?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Spirit Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of #the hero#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #an Odd Mushroom# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #3# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.
